title: Legal Updates for Fire Departments and Public Safety Agencies
summary: The newsletter covers various legal updates affecting fire departments, including legislative proposals such as SB 6250/SB 1605 and HB 1425/OPMA. Key topics include annexation issues, revenue bills, small works roster changes, fireworks ordnances, and a proposed firefighter memorial license plate program. The document also discusses First Amendment rights in the context of public employee unions and union dues.
